actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  *
FROM
  public.issue_event
WHERE
  "description" ilike '%{{issueEventTable.searchText}}%'
ORDER BY
  "{{issueEventTable.sortOrder.column || 'id'}}" {{issueEventTable.sortOrder.order !== "desc" ? "" : "DESC"}}
LIMIT
  {{issueEventTable.pageSize}}
OFFSET
  {{issueEventTable.pageOffset}}

LIMIT

OFFSET
  {{issueEventTable.pageOffset}}
